sentences.sContent: ...a retired banker well known for his philanthropy.
sentences.sCn: ...一位以乐善好施闻名的退休银行家。

remMethod.val: phil (爱) + anthrop (人) + y → 老吾老以及人之老， 幼吾幼以及人之幼 → 慈爱

words.tran: 慈善家，博爱主义者；乐善好施的人

trans.tranOther: the practice of giving money and help to people who are poor or in trouble
